text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Hillsborough, California |official_name = |other_name = |settlement_type = Town in California |motto = |image_skyline = File:Carolands Chateau.jpg |imagesize = 250x200px |image_caption = Carolands |image_flag = |flag_size = |image_seal = Seal of Hillsborough, California.png |seal_size = |image_map = File:San Mateo County California Incorporated and Unincorporated areas Hillsborough Highlighted 0633798.svg |mapsize = 250x200px |map_caption = Location of Hillsborough in San Mateo County, California. |image_map1 = |mapsize1 = |map_caption1 = | pushpin_map = USA | pushpin_map_caption = Location in the United States | pushpin_relief = 1 |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = United States |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = California |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = San Mateo |government_footnotes = |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |leader_title1 = |leader_name1 = |established_title = Incorporated |established_date = May 5, 1910 |total_type = Total | unit_pref = Imperial | area_footnotes = | area_total_sq_mi = 6.17 | area_land_sq_mi = 6.17 | area_water_sq_mi = 0.00 | area_total_km2 = 15.97 | area_land_km2 = 15.97 | area_water_km2 = 0.00 | area_water_percent = 0 | area_note = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_ft = 322 |elevation_m = 98 |population_as_of = 2020 |population_footnotes = |population_total = 11387 |population_density_sq_mi = auto |population_metro = |population_density_metro_sq_mi = |population_density_km2 = 713.15 |timezone = Pacific |utc_offset = -8 |timezone_DST = PDT |utc_offset_DST = -7 |coordinates = |postal_code_type = ZIP code |postal_code = 94010 |area_code_type = Area code |area_code = 650 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = |blank1_name = GNIS feature IDs |blank1_info = , |website = |footnotes = }} Hillsborough is an incorporated town in San Mateo County, California, in the San Francisco Bay Area. It is located south of San Francisco on the San Francisco Peninsula. The population was 11,387 as of 2020. ==References== Category:Towns in California Category:Settlements in San Mateo County, California Category:Cities in the San Francisco Bay Area
